detail_desc: Calf-length flared skirt in a cotton weave with lacing at the front. Wide, reinforced waist with support panels and pleats, and a concealed zip at the back.
Leather ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Leather ballet pumps with a decorative bow at the front and elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles.
Suede hi-tops with a zip in the side and a decorative bow on the outside. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a dress and leggings in soft jersey. Dress in patterned cotton with 3/4-length sleeves with frilled cuffs, fastening with concealed press-studs at the back, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist and scalloped hems.
Suede sandals with two straps at the front with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Suede sandals with two straps at the front with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Trousers in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell. High waist with elastication and a detachable tie belt, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Derby shoes with elongated toes and lacing at the top. Canvas linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 2.5 cm.
Short-sleeved, V-neck top in mesh with press-studs down the front and a print motif on the chest.
Suede shoes with lacing at the front, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Block-striped swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a lined fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Boots in imitation leather with visible scuba linings, lacing with speed hooks at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem.
Short, wide, short-sleeved sports top in printed, fast-drying mesh layered over a vest top with a racer back.
Sturdy hi-tops in imitation suede with mesh details, a padded edge and tongue with a loop. Lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a dress and tights. Flared, long-sleeved dress in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a frill trim on the shoulders and a soft brushed inside. Fine-knit, cotton-blend tights with an elasticated waist.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with toe caps, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with toe caps, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leather trainers with lacing at the front. Fabric linings, leather insoles and embossed rubber soles.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour elasticated waistband and 3/4-length legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour elasticated waistband and 3/4-length legs.
Long shirt in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long shirt in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and frills at the top.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Sparkly stone embellishment at the front and slim legs.
Cropped top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with embroidery, and a cut-off, raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.
Suede thigh boots with pointed toes and a soft shaft with a half-zip in the side. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Longer, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, long sleeves with inner ribbing and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Fully lined printed bikini. Triangle top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable ties at the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.
Fully lined bikini with lace. Triangle top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.
Fully lined bikini with lace. Triangle top with a decorative ring at the front, adjustable ties at the back of the neck and a plastic fastener at the back. Bottoms with decorative rings at the sides.
Ankle boots in soft leather with pointed toes and a zip at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Kitten heels 5.5 cm.
Ankle boots in soft leather with pointed toes and a zip at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Kitten heels 5.5 cm.

Checked cotton flannel shirt with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight cut with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, text print on the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
